languages.text: "Торбальд щедро даровал мне место на своей десантной ладье, дабы Зловещий вой расколол небеса Ефрата-II".
"The generous Thorbald honoured me with a place aboard his landing drekkar so that the Baleful Howl could split the skies over Eufrates II."
languages.original_text: "Торбальд щедро даровал мне место на своей десантной ладье, дабы Зловещий вой расколол небеса Ефрата-II".

traits.locale_text: "The generous Thorbald honoured me with a place aboard his landing drekkar so that the howl of the Famehungry could split the skies over Eufrates II."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The generous Thorbald honoured me with a place aboard his landing drekkar so that the howl of the Famehungry could split the skies over Eufrates II."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The generous Thorbald honoured me with a place aboard his landing drekkar so that the howl of the Famehungry could split the skies over Eufrates II."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The generous Thorbald honoured me with a place aboard his landing drekkar so that the howl of the Famehungry could split the skies over Eufrates II."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The generous Thorbald honoured me with a place aboard his landing drekkar so that the Baleful Howl could split the skies over Eufrates II."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The generous Thorbald honoured me with a place aboard his landing drekkar so that the Baleful Howl could split the skies over Eufrates II."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “慷慨的索巴德让我登上了他的撞角长船，让怒嚎者的嚎叫声响彻欧夫拉茨二号星。”
languages.original_text: "The generous Thorbald honoured me with a place aboard his landing drekkar so that the Baleful Howl could split the skies over Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: “慷慨的索巴德让我登上了他的撞角长船，让渴名者的嚎叫声响彻欧夫拉茨二号星。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Le généreux Thorbald m'a fait l'honneur de me laisser embarquer à bord de son drekkar pour que les Hurleurs sanguinaires puissent déchirer le ciel d'Euphrate-II. »
languages.original_text: "The generous Thorbald honoured me with a place aboard his landing drekkar so that the Baleful Howl could split the skies over Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: « Le généreux Thorbald m'a fait l'honneur de me laisser embarquer à bord de son drekkar pour que le hurlement des Dévoreurs de gloire puisse fendre le ciel d'Euphrate-II. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「寛容なトールバルドが、破滅の咆哮がユーフラテス・IIの空を裂くことができるよう、上陸用のドレッカールに乗船させてくれた」
languages.original_text: "The generous Thorbald honoured me with a place aboard his landing drekkar so that the Baleful Howl could split the skies over Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: 「寛容なトールバルドが、誉れある飢えの遠吠えがユーフラテス・IIの空を裂くことができるよう、上陸用のドレッカールに乗船させてくれた」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «El generoso Thorbald me honró con un puesto en su drekkar de aterrizaje, para que el rugido del Aullido Torvo atravesara los cielos de Eufrates II».
languages.original_text: "The generous Thorbald honoured me with a place aboard his landing drekkar so that the Baleful Howl could split the skies over Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: «El generoso Thorbald me honró con un puesto en su drekkar de aterrizaje, para que el rugido de los Hambrientos de Fama atravesara los cielos de Eufrates II».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Der großzügige Thorbald hat mich mit einem Platz auf seinem Lande-Drekkar geehrt, damit die Baleful Howl die Himmel über Eufrates II spalten können."
languages.original_text: "The generous Thorbald honoured me with a place aboard his landing drekkar so that the Baleful Howl could split the skies over Eufrates II."

traits.locale_text: "Der großzügige Thorbald hat mich mit einem Platz auf seinem Lande-Drekkar geehrt, damit das Geheul der Famehungry die Himmel über Eufrates II spalten kann."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Alicenap Thorbald, iniş yapan drekkarında bana da bir yer bahşetti. Onun sayesinde Uğursuz Uluma'nın Eufrates II'nin göğünü yarıp geçmesi mümkün oldu."
languages.original_text: "The generous Thorbald honoured me with a place aboard his landing drekkar so that the Baleful Howl could split the skies over Eufrates II."
